Student Centers     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Student Centers      Student Centers   Main Menu    About Us           Contact Us    Hours & Locations    Policies    Staff Directory         Services           Lockers    Bicycle Repair         Dining           Student Center East    Student Center West    Student Services Building    Alternate Campus Dining         Reservations    Bookstore    Bowling & Billiards           Hours    Rates and Reservations    Specials          Eyebrow menu    Policies    Sustainability    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      About Us      View Menu            About the Student Centers  Welcome to the UIC Student Centers,  The Student Centers provide spaces and services that enhance the student experience.  Since opening in 1969, the Student Centers have been the center of the UIC Campus Community.  Student Center East (SCE) has a large variety of food options, meeting spaces and services such as the University Bookstore and The Alley Bowling & Billiards.  This makes SCE a great destination for thousands of students and other members of the University community.  Student Center West (SCW) provides many of the same services on a smaller scale, that focuses on the unique needs of the medical students on the west campus.  Food, lounge spaces and meeting rooms comprises the bulk of the space at SCW.  We hope you will visit and return often, getting involved in Student Life (@UIClife) is one of the strongest predictors of success and graduation!  We welcome your thoughts and suggestions on how we can continue to help maintain an exceptional UIC experience.      The Student Centers serves as the heart of UIC, where leading, campus life, and community building are fostered through programs and opportunities for involvement and engagement, healthy activities, convenient services, sustainable initiatives and high quality facilities.
